Instance.description: An interaction that uses the picker for selecting a recipe, but in two different ways One variant is for use it in a multipicker displaying all the recipes, the other is to show only the family recipes that the sim knows.

TunableVariant.name: mode
TunableVariant.description: Mode to be used to filter the recipes

TunableTuple.name: creation
TunableTuple.description: All existing recipes in the recipe list are used to be selected to create a family recipe.

TunableTuple.name: preparation
TunableTuple.description: Only recipes that are saved as family recipes will be shown.
